title: How would you train your dragon? - Quora
tags: How To Train Your Dragon 2 (2014 movie)
How To Train Your Dragon (2010 movie)

response.answer_text: Funny, I’ve actually considered this before. In fact I once tried to write a HTTYD fanfic and introduce a new species of Fury. It went to shit in 3 chapters because I had no idea what I was doing. The main character of the fanfic was a girl, I can’t remember her name but she got renamed Ryder after she was brainwashed. Her dragon was a Twilight Fury. It’s exactly what you’re thinking of. A specifically bred hybrid of Light and Night. It was slate gray, because that’s what I thought a hybrid of Light and Night would actually look like assuming the two’s color palete genes could be co-dominant. I can’t remember the Twilight Fury’s name, either, but he was part of a litter of triplets. His siblings I remember very well, Hades and Persephone, because I’m like that. Anyway, Ryder trained her dragon much the same as Hiccup did Toothless, albeit having a much easier time of it in some ways since Hiccup knew how to train a Fury, and much a much harder time of it in some ways due to how Twilight furies came about. The Dragons in HTTYD are intelligent and easy to train when trust is established, for the most part. So that’s the hard part.
